languages.text: "Мыслеблок — это же чудовищно опасно. Как у нас мозги не спеклись?!"
"But a mindlock is incredibly dangerous. It's a bloody miracle it didn't fry our brains!"
languages.original_text: "Мыслеблок — это же чудовищно опасно. Как у нас мозги не спеклись?!"

traits.locale_text: "But mindlock is incredibly dangerous. How didn't their brains fry up?"
"But mindlock is incredibly dangerous. How didn't their brains fry up?"
"But the mindlock is incredibly dangerous. How didn't our brains fry up?"
"But the mindlock is incredibly dangerous. How didn't our brains fry up?"
"But a mindlock is incredibly dangerous. It's a bloody miracle it didn't fry our brains!"
"But a mindlock is incredibly dangerous. It's a bloody miracle it didn't fry our brains!"

languages.text: « Mais le verrouillage mental est incroyablement dangereux. C'est un miracle que ça ne nous ait pas grillé le cerveau ! »
languages.original_text: "But a mindlock is incredibly dangerous. It's a bloody miracle it didn't fry our brains!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais le verrouillage mental est incroyablement dangereux. Comment ça se fait que ça ne nous ait pas grillé le cerveau ? »

languages.text: «Un bloqueo mental es algo increíblemente peligroso. ¡Es un milagro que no nos haya frito la sesera!».
languages.original_text: "But a mindlock is incredibly dangerous. It's a bloody miracle it didn't fry our brains!"

traits.locale_text: «Con lo peligroso que es el bloqueo mental... ¿Cómo no nos hemos freído el cerebro?».

languages.text: “施加心灵锁是件极其危险的事情。我们的脑子居然没被烧烂，真他妈见了鬼了！”
languages.original_text: "But a mindlock is incredibly dangerous. It's a bloody miracle it didn't fry our brains!"

traits.locale_text: “施加心灵锁是件极其危险的事情，可我们的脑子怎么还好好的？”

languages.text: 「でも、マインドロックは恐ろしいほど危険よ。どうして脳がイカれなかったの？」
languages.original_text: "But a mindlock is incredibly dangerous. It's a bloody miracle it didn't fry our brains!"

traits.locale_text: 「でも、マインドロックは恐ろしいほど危険よ。どうして脳がイカれなかったの？」

languages.text: "Doch eine Gedankensperre ist unglaublich gefährlich. Es ist ein verfluchtes Wunder, dass sie unsere Gehirne nicht verkohlt hat!"
languages.original_text: "But a mindlock is incredibly dangerous. It's a bloody miracle it didn't fry our brains!"

traits.locale_text: "Doch die Gedankensperre ist unglaublich gefährlich. Wieso sind unsere Gehirne nicht geröstet worden?"
